Today in County Sligo, surf is small and poor at 2 ft @9s N with fresh 6 mph ENE winds. Tomorrow sees a slight improvement with 2 ft @11s N, light SE winds making it more workable at spots like Dunmoran Strand and Lackan Bay. The day after, surf picks up to 6 ft @8s NNW with light WSW winds, offering fun conditions at several locations. Best: day after.
